channel.title: WinRM on Gary Flynn
channel.description: Recent content in WinRM on Gary Flynn

item.title: Increase WinRM / PowerShell Limits
item.description: For many organisations, PowerShell remoting is done through a scripthost server where maximum concurrent session limits and maximum connected user limits can be reached. As explained in this Microsoft blog, the following error might be encountered. PS> New-PSSession [localhost] Connecting to remote server failed with the following error message : The WS-Management service cannot process the request. This user isÂ allowed a maximum number of 5 concurrent shells, which has been exceeded.
